title: Practical Applications of Differentiation: Ontosminotic Approach and ICT-Integrated Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic calculus concepts and foundational understanding of functions in economics/business
context.additional_context: Learners comprising current practitioners aim to improve real-world problem-solving skills through case studies of economic/business applications of differentiation

learning_goals: Learners can interpret the concept of tangents geometrically and apply it to real-world data
Learners can solve optimization problems by calculating maximum/minimum values of economic functions using differentiation rules
Learners can perform graphical and marginal analysis of functions using ICT tools (graphing calculators, simulation software, etc.)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
